query:
UPDATE media_image_variants
            SET
                cached = true,
                width = COALESCE($5, width),
                height = COALESCE($6, height),
                content_hash = COALESCE($7, content_hash),
                theme_color = COALESCE($8, theme_color),
                cached_at = NOW()
            WHERE media_type = $1
              AND media_id = $2
              AND image_type = $3
              AND order_index = $4
              AND variant = $9
            RETURNING
                media_type,
                media_id,
                image_type,
                order_index,
                variant,
                cached,
                width,
                height,
                content_hash,
                theme_color,
                requested_at,
                cached_at
